name: fourteener
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mountain that is over 14,000 feet high: Sisnaajini (Blanca Peak), one of Colorado's famed "fourteeners", attracts a lot of hikers and climbers. Because of the proximity to Denver, it's very easy to get there, and you can climb three Fourteeners in one day.
More examplesFewer examplesIf you've never been on top of a Fourteener in the winter you'll be amazed at some of the precarious routes he has climbed and skied.While bagging the Fourteeners she walked about 350 miles.They used to go hiking and climb fourteeners together. I have some big plans I'm going to work on this winter. The first one is to try to ski all of the California Fourteeners.
